attributes.action: Raise more awareness for women suffering from endometriosis, and adequate support and help for their families.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is not enough awareness or support for women with endometriosis, they are misunderstand, and most of the time lack help for themselves and their partners and families. It is about time the government raised more awareness on endometriosis and the devastating effect it has on so many women and their families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
